about_the_game:
Important tips:


This is an old story about the imminent resurrection of the devil and the havoc in the world.
But the hero who wants to save the world is a novice girl ninja!
No one knows why such an important task falls on the girl, but she knows that you are the only one who can help her!
Go! Guide the way, use the only ninja, break through many difficulties!

Important tips:


This is a horizontal platform game, action, puzzles and collection tasks are the core of the game.
Every level requires you to avoid hostile creatures, get over the trap, and unlock the trap.
Finally, after collecting all the scrolls in the level to complete the task, you must also find the kite to enter the next level.

So not only do you need some operational skills, but also you need to use the unique skills of the character to complete the level puzzle. Combine these two skills to achieve customs clearance in the least time, and finally face three powerful bosses!

Important tips:


Plan A. When there are 500 wishlists, release the demo DOME;
When there are 1000 wishlists, the EA version is online'
When the wishlist exceeds 2000, it will be officially available within 3 months.
Your attention is what drives NINMAKI.

short_description: What do you know as a ninja? An expert in stealth? Or a powerful killing machine? NinMaki is a side-scrolling action puzzle game where you experience a ninja mission.
